name: Game for IGMC 2022
description:
IGMC is reborn. The stars aligned and destiny has brought me out of the bottomless abyss of mobile gaming to create an RPG Maker game for this very purpose. But what is this game about? Just your typical kids dabbling in some dark ritual again. Nothing particularly mind blowing. Hope you have fun playing the game.

- RTP is not needed

- There is blood and some dead bodies and body parts

- Jump scares

P.S. I was thinking of Misao when I started making this, but then it just went out of control in a completely random direction...
